name: DeskMoz – 24×7 Chat Agents
author: DeskMoz - Development Team

sections.description:
This plugin is the real time WordPress plugin of https://DeskMoz.com for 24×7 live chat agent services. Thorugh DeskMoz, we provide live chat agents who can chat with your website’s visitors and provide them sales & post sales support. DeskMoz’s agents are qualified and experienced and can not only generate leads but provide full customer support which a website actually needs.

Once you sign-up at DeskMoz.com, just install this plugin, enter the credentials and it will place the script/code (hosted on http://121chatagent.com) on all the pages automatically. Once done, you can use DeskMoz’s dashboard to see your website’s chats.

DeskMoz has integrated with LiveChat Inc. and uses their widget to provide support. We do not charge anything for widget.

Features

  • 24×7 (350+ days) Live Chat Agents for your Website.

  • 10 Days Free Trial. No Credit Card Required.

  • No Setup Fee

  • Multiple Websites Supported

  • Leads & Tickets Generation

  • Best-in-industry Dashboard

  • SMS Notifications for Leads

  • White Label Widget

  • Dedicated Accounts Manager

  • Skype Support

  • Free Live Chat Widget

  • Real-Time Chat Transcripts

  • Unused Chats Forwarding

1-minute live chat installation

Our DeskMoz – 24×7 Chat Agents plugin gives you the ability to assign 24×7 live chat agents to your website. The chat agents can chat with every visitor who is interested in a live chat. Initiate live chat with certain visitors or wait for them to initiate a live chat with the chat agents. Increase your website’s conversion rates by providing real-time live support.

Quick Overview

You need to register your website on https://www.deskmoz.com/sign-up/ before activating the live chat plugin. Once the DeskMoz – 24×7 Chat Agents plugin is activated, you will be assigned live chat agents, who will be available 24×7 to chat with your website’s visitors. As soon as a visitor lands on your website, a live chat box will be displayed on their screen. If they fill out their details and click “Start Chat”, they will be connected with a live chat agent.

Using DeskMoz – 24×7 Chat Agents effectively on your website

One of the most important tasks of businesses is to communicate with customers about the attributes and other details of the products and/or services. Having live chat widget on the website enables the businesses to fulfill this need.

  • DeskMoz – 24×7 Chat Agents is convenient for customers
  • Live chat services builds trust among customers
  • Generates sales leads
  • Provides support to the existing customers
  • Reduce costs by using DeskMoz – 24×7 Chat Agents plugin on your website

Short Description

24×7 Live Chat Agents by https://DeskMoz.com
sections.faq:
How can I use Live Chat Agents services through this plugin?

You need to sign-up and https://DeskMoz.com. Once you sign-up, and activate your account, just install this plugin on your website. Enter the credentials and it will place live chat code/script on your website. We will start training of our agents, and will make them live in 48 hours.

Is there any trial?

Yes we provide no obligatory 10 days free trial. No credit card needed.

What are your pricing?

Please visit https://DeskMoz.com/pricing/

Troubleshooting

If you’re experiencing issues running DeskMoz – 24×7 Chat Agents plugin, please take note of the following:

  • The live chat box will only show up on the front end if you are logged in to your wp-admin section.
  • The default delay before the live chat box appears is 10 seconds. You can change this on the settings page.
  • If you press the “X” within the live chat window, on the front end, a cookie will be set that will stop the chat box from showing for another 24 hours.

If the live chat box still does not appear on your website, please go through the following steps:

  • Ensure that no other plugins are causing JavaScript errors on your website. This could interfere with the execution of our plugin’s JavaScript.
  • If you need more help, please use the support forum or contact us and we’ll get to the bottom of the problem as soon as possible!
